p: Table 1 demonstrates the case fatality in the state of Maryland, stratified by race. The frequency of confirmed cases and mortality were 2064 and 55, respectively, for Blacks in 04th April, with a case fatality of 2.7%, while the case fatality for White was 2.5%, Ï‡ 2 (4) =13.6, p = 0.001. A follow up period by 4th April indicated increased case fatality among Blacks/AA, 3.3%, resulting in a positive trend in case fatality with respect to period change 22.2%.
